name: ServiceNow
description: ServiceNow automates and streamlines work and helps create great employee and customer experiences.

options.name: URL
options.description: The URL of the ServiceNow instance to connect to including the schema (i.e., https://)

options.name: Username
options.description: The username to login to ServiceNow with

options.name: Password
options.description: The password to login to ServiceNow with

options.name: Search By Annotated Entities
options.description: This will toggle whether or not to search the ServiceNow for annotated entities found in your channels.

options.name: Incident Query Fields
options.description:
A comma separated list of Fields to query against Incidents.  
NOTE: If a field is not in this list, it will not be searched on Incident Queries.
(This applies to IP address, domain, and annotated entity searches)

options.name: Enable Asset Search
options.description: If checked, the integration will search ServiceNow's Asset Table (alm_asset) for IP addresses, domains, and annotated entities.

options.name: Asset Query Fields
options.description:
A comma separated list of fields to search domains and IPs by in ServiceNow's Asset Table.  
NOTE: If a field is not in this list, it will not be searched on for in ServiceNow's Asset Table.
(This applies to IP Addresses, Domains, and String searches)
